Title: Visiting Hours
Writer: Carlton Cuse (developed for television by), Kerry Ehrin (developed for television by), Anthony Cipriano (developed for television by), Robert Bloch (based on characters from the novel 'Psycho' by), Philip Buiser (executive story editor), Torrey Speer (story editor), Scott Kosar
Actors: Vera Farmiga, Freddie Highmore, Max Thieriot, Olivia Cooke
Plot: Norman's legal problems worsen; Emma takes care of family business as Dylan finds himself caught between his past and his future; Romero begins his plan for revenge.
